Predict and Prevent Plant Downtime

We connect and collect data from your plant management systems and run this data through our custom analytics platform to alert, track, and trend major problems before they happen.

More

Less downtime

Today your plant is humming along, but on the night shift a critical component malfunctions or completely fails. As a result, your plant shuts down for emergency repair. How much will this cost? Do you have the extra parts on hand? How many employees does this affect? How does this affect your output and timelines? The unknown can be scary and costly. Streamlyne gives you the ability to be proactive by giving your operators and managers the alerts needed to prevent reactive consequences.

Better performance means satisfied customers

Interruptions in production and workflow directly impacts your customers, and your customers customer. Streamlyne allows your company to track and trend so that you can better predict events related to loss of production and affected timelines. With better planning, this gives your customer the best service and experience possible.

Improving Safety

Having the right information at all times protects you and your employees from harm. The ability to access the latest information on assets, lock-outs, blinds, CAD’s, procedures, work orders, and safety alerts while working on a piece of equipment is critical to safety when working with hazardous chemicals, gases, and large interworking pieces of equipment. This becomes even more important with new employees.

Real-time Data at your fingertips

We simplify the way oil and gas operators do their jobs.Streamlyne delivers live information that will gives you a complete overview of asset information, including critical information on hazard and safety alerts while working on a piece of equipment. Collaborate and share knowledge
New and senior employees can share knowledge on plant operations, which makes everybody and the entire company smarter.
